00011       Font::~Font( )
00012       {
00013             if( mTex ) {
00014                   delete mTex;
00015                   mTex = 0;

00019       bool Font::Init( std::string fontname, int fontsize, int fontweight, int charsetstart, int charsetend )
00020       {
00021             //:: Initialize stuff
00022             HDC fntdc = CreateCompatibleDC( GetDC( 0 ) );
00023             HFONT fntobj = CreateFont( -fontsize, 0, 0, 0, fontweight,
00024                   FALSE, FALSE, FALSE, ANSI_CHARSET, OUT_DEFAULT_PRECIS, CLIP_DEFAULT_PRECIS,
00025                   ANTIALIASED_QUALITY, DEFAULT_PITCH, fontname.c_str( ) );
00026             SelectObject( fntdc, fntobj );
00027 
00028             TEXTMETRIC metrics;
00029             GetTextMetrics( fntdc, &metrics );
00030             mLineHeight = metrics.tmHeight;
00031 
00032             for( int i = 0; i < 256; i++ )
00033             {
00034                   if( i == ' ' ) {
00035                         GetCharWidth32( fntdc, ' ', ' ', &mChars[i].width );
00036                         mChars[i].flags = 2;
00037                   } else if( i == '\t' ) {
00038                         GetCharWidth32( fntdc, ' ', ' ', &mChars[i].width );
00039                         mChars[i].width *= 4;
00040                         mChars[i].flags = 2;
00041                   } else if( i == '\n' ) {
00042                         mChars[i].width = 0;
00043                         mChars[i].flags = 2;
00044                   } else if( ( i >= charsetstart && i <= charsetend ) || i == '?' ) {
00045                         GetCharWidth32( fntdc, i, i, &mChars[i].width );
00046                         mChars[i].flags = 1;
00047                   } else {
00048                         mChars[i].width = 0;
00049                         mChars[i].flags = 0;
00050                   }
00051             }
00052 
00053             int texwidth, texheight;
00054             for( int size = 64; size <= 2048; size *= 2 )
00055             {
00056                   bool failed = false;
00057                   for( int i = 0, ix = 0, iy = 0; i < 256; i++ )
00058                   {
00059                         if( mChars[i].flags == 1 ) {
00060                               // Check if we overran the texture width
00061                               if( ix + mChars[i].width > size ) {
00062                                     ix = 0;
00063                                     iy += mLineHeight;
00064                               }
00065                               // Check if we overran the texture height
00066                               if( iy + mLineHeight > size ) {
00067                                     failed = true;
00068                                     break;
00069                               }
00070 
00071                               mChars[i].x = ix;
00072                               mChars[i].y = iy;
00073 
00074                               ix += mChars[i].width;
00075                         }
00076                   }
00077                   if( failed )
00078                         continue;
00079 
00080                   texwidth = size;
00081                   texheight = size;
00082                   break;
00083             }
00084 
00085             HBITMAP fntbmp = CreateCompatibleBitmap( GetDC( 0 ), texwidth, texheight );
00086             SelectObject( fntdc, fntbmp );
00087             BitBlt( fntdc, 0, 0, texwidth, texheight, 0, 0, 0, WHITENESS );
00088 
00089             for( int i = 0; i < 256; i++ )
00090             {
00091                   if( mChars[i].flags == 1 ) {
00092                         RECT rect;
00093                         rect.left = mChars[i].x; rect.right = rect.left + mChars[i].width;
00094                         rect.top = mChars[i].y; rect.bottom = rect.top + mLineHeight;
00095                         DrawText( fntdc, (char*)&i, 1, &rect, DT_LEFT | DT_NOPREFIX );
00096                   }
00097             }
00098 
00099             //:: Create real texture!
00100             unsigned int picount = texwidth * texheight;
00101             unsigned int* data = new unsigned int[ picount ];
00102             int rval = GetBitmapBits( fntbmp, picount * 4, data );
00103             mTex = new Halia::Texture( texwidth, texheight, Halia::TextureFormat::A8L8 );
00104             unsigned short* texbuf = (unsigned short*)mTex->GetBuffer( );
00105             for( unsigned int i = 0; i < picount; i++ )
00106                   *texbuf++ = ~( data[i] << 8 ) | 0x00FF;
00107             delete data;
00108 
00109             //:: Clean shit up!
00110             DeleteObject( fntobj );
00111             DeleteObject( fntbmp );
00112             DeleteObject( fntdc );
00113 
00114             return true;
00115       };
00116 
00117       void Font::DrawString( int x, int y, std::string text, unsigned int color ) const
00118       {
00119             int ix = x;
00120             int iy = y;
00121 
00122             for( std::string::iterator i = text.begin( ); i != text.end( ); i++ )
00123             {
00124                   char c = *i;
00125                   if( c != '\n' ) {
00126                         // If the character doesn't exist, switch to the ? sign
00127                         if( mChars[ c ].flags == 0 )
00128                               c = '?';
00129 
00130                         if( mChars[ c ].flags == 1 ) {
00131                               HRS->DrawSprite(
00132                                     ix,
00133                                     iy,
00134                                     mChars[ c ].width,
00135                                     mLineHeight,
00136                                     mChars[ c ].x,
00137                                     mChars[ c ].y,
00138                                     mChars[ c ].width,
00139                                     mLineHeight,
00140                                     mTex,
00141                                     color
00142                               );
00143                         }
00144 
00145                         ix += mChars[ c ].width;
00146                   } else {
00147                         ix = x;
00148                         iy += mLineHeight;
00149                   }
00150             }
00151       };
00152 
00153       Point Font::GetDimensions( std::string text ) const
00154       {
00155             int ix = 0;
00156             int iy = 0;
00157             for( std::string::iterator i = text.begin( ); i != text.end( ); i++ )
00158             {
00159                   char c = *i;
00160                   if( c != '\n' ) {
00161                         // If the character doesn't exist, switch to the ? sign
00162                         if( mChars[ c ].flags == 0 )
00163                               c = '?';
00164                         ix += mChars[ c ].width;
00165                   } else {
00166                         ix = 0;
00167                         iy += mLineHeight;
00168                   }
00169             }
00170 
00171             return Point( ix, iy + mLineHeight );
00172       };
00173 };
